Requirement: The system should use the company colors and logos.
The system shall have a well-defined software architecture with clear separation of concerns to facilitate maintainability
The system shall be expected to manage the nursing program curriculum and class/clinical scheduling for a minimum of 5 years.
The software architecture should be modular and scalable allowing for easy integration of new features and functionalities as the system evolves

The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the  Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies.  Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.
The system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest ratings for the input criteria
The software should provide flexible APIs and SDKs for developers to integrate with different IoT platforms and services
The system will use a single password per user to login to the E-Store System.
The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.
The system shall support automated unit testing and test coverage analysis to ensure code quality and facilitate maintenance
The software shall be regularly updated to ensure compatibility with the latest operating systems and dependencies
The system shall allow the initiator to send and receive messages from users.
The system shall include actuators to control the temperature of heating or cooling systems
The system shall have a web-based interface for users to monitor and control IoT devices
The system shall include a mobile application for users to monitor and control IoT devices on the go
The system shall allow the mediator to send and receive messages from users.
